title: 043: How To Create a Thriving Yoga Business Online and In The World With Brett Larkin
itunes:title: 043: How To Create a Thriving Yoga Business Online and In The World With Brett Larkin
description:
Has yoga changed your life and you want to share it’s healing benefits with the world but don’t know where to start or how to make it into a global business? Brett Larkin breaks it down PLUS offers $100 off her online Yoga Teacher Training with our Highest Self Podcast Community! Learn more about it and receive the gift with coupon SAHARA here: http://www.brettlarkin.com/sahara

Discover Brett’s yoga classes: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCytVtpRDpY8zREuA37DzTmw Watch a sample video: http://www.brettlarkin.com/yoga-teacher-training-sample-video/?ref=9

Connect with Brett at brettlarkin.com

Follow my journey to INDIA this month on Instagram @IAmSaharaRose

Check Out The Show-notes at HighestSelfPodcast.com

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books

This podcast is for educational purposes only. The host claims no responsibility to any person or entity for any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly as a result of the use, application, or interpretation of the information presented herein.
